<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/users/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get information about a specific user.

You can find more information about user management [here](../../docs/guides/principals/managing-users).

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}

</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
